mean_cn: n. 赌注；打赌；  v. 打赌；敢断定
mean_en: an agreement in which people try to guess what will happen and the person who guesses wrong has to give something (such as money) to the person who guesses right
sentence: I made a huge bet in the game but I lost, and now I have no money.
sentence_trans: 我在赌局下了很大的注，但我输了，现在我没钱了。
